mapper.select: select SCHE_NO as sche_no ,SCHE_DT as sche_dt ,SCHE_TITLE as sche_title ,SCHE_CONTENT as sche_content ,SCHE_SE as sche_se ,REGIST_ID as regist_id ,REGIST_DT as regist_dt from SCHE_LIST where SCHE_NO = #{schId}
select 'SCH' || lpad(SEQ_SCHE_LIST.nextval+1, 7, '0') as sche_no from dual
select DUTY_MONTH ,DUTY_DAY ,USER_NM from SCH_DUTY_LIST where DUTY_MONTH = #{month} and DUTY_YEAR = #{year} order by SORT_ORDER asc
